channel.title: 317 My friend can't play on my server
channel.description: I made a DL client and I deleted all of the java files in it and kept everything else. Whenever he runs it, it says Could not find the main class GUI, program will exit.

item.title: 317 My friend can't play on my server
item.dc:creator: @Frozen_Scape Frozen Scape
item.description:
@Frozen_Scape wrote:

I too have this problem i think tbh i really dont know what is wrong with my server i thought i did everything i portforward and everything but i can connect but my freinds cant it just says error with a white screen. if you guys can add me on skype or somthing it would be much appreciated skype:loganisskyping

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: 317 My friend can't play on my server
item.dc:creator: @Illadelph Illadelph
item.description:
@Illadelph wrote:

tryed to re-upload a client with all the files and see if its cause you deleted something, if not its most likely a portforward problem or if you dont have a static ip and it changes it can screw up the portforward.

item.title: 317 My friend can't play on my server
item.dc:creator: @Illadelph Illadelph
item.description:
@Illadelph wrote:

When uploading clients for players other then yourself just hide the files so it looks cleaner dont delete anything or you could end up with this problem.

also did you change all the client server ip info to your no-ip.org?

Read full topic
